With label and help text

```js
class TextFieldExample extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props);
    this.state = { value: "" };
  }

  render() {
    return (
      <TextField
        label="Floating label text"
        helperText={<TextFieldHelperText>Help text</TextFieldHelperText>}
        value={this.state.value}
        onChange={e => this.setState({ value: e.target.value })}
      />
    );
  }
}

<TextFieldExample />;
```

Required password, persistent help text and validation (min 8 chars)

```js
class TextFieldExample extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props);
    this.state = { value: "" };
  }

  render() {
    return (
      <TextField
        type="password"
        label="Choose password"
        helperText={
          <TextFieldHelperText persistent validation>
            Must be at least 8 characters long
          </TextFieldHelperText>
        }
        required
        minLength="8"
        value={this.state.value}
        onChange={e => this.setState({ value: e.target.value })}
      />
    );
  }
}

<TextFieldExample />;
```

Leading icon

```js
class TextFieldExample extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props);
    this.state = { value: "" };
  }

  render() {
    return (
      <TextField
        label="Your name"
        leadingIcon={<TextFieldIcon>person</TextFieldIcon>}
        value={this.state.value}
        onChange={e => this.setState({ value: e.target.value })}
      />
    );
  }
}

<TextFieldExample />;
```

Clickable trailing icon

```js
class TextFieldExample extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props);
    this.state = { value: "" };
  }

  render() {
    return (
      <TextField
        label="Your name"
        value={this.state.value}
        onChange={e => this.setState({ value: e.target.value })}
        trailingIcon={
          <TextFieldIcon onClick={() => this.setState({ value: "" })}>
            clear
          </TextFieldIcon>
        }
      />
    );
  }
}

<TextFieldExample />;
```

Native date picker

```js
class TextFieldExample extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props);
    this.state = { date: null };
  }

  render() {
    return (
      <React.Fragment>
        <TextField
          type="date"
          label="Choose a date"
          value={this.state.value}
          onChange={e => this.setState({ date: e.target.value })}
        />
        <p>Selected date: {this.state.date}</p>
      </React.Fragment>
    );
  }
}

<TextFieldExample />;
```

With prefix

```js
class TextFieldExample extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props);
    this.state = { value: "" };
  }

  render() {
    return (
      <TextField
        label="Price"
        helperText={<TextFieldHelperText>Help text</TextFieldHelperText>}
        value={this.state.value}
        onChange={e => this.setState({ value: e.target.value })}
        prefix="$"
      />
    );
  }
}

<TextFieldExample />;
```
